resources.string: AThe Software includes decompiling functionality ("JetBrains Decompiler") that enables reproducing source code from the original binary code. Licensee acknowledges that binary code and source code might be protected by copyright and trademark laws. Before using JetBrains Decompiler, Licensee should make sure that decompilation of binary code is not prohibited by the applicable license agreement (except to the extent that Licensee may be expressly permitted under applicable law) or that Licensee has obtained permission to decompile th e binary code from the copyright owner.on
